DanceStep.Comment: Slow, Slow, Quick, Quick Forward: Heal hits first (softly) (feeling is cross-country skiing) Backward: Toe slides along the gound, look over left shoulder
She turns RIGHT Lead at the end of the 2nd quick LOWER hand to tell her to stop
She turns LEFT Lead at end of the first slow Put my hand on her back to tell her to stop

DanceStep.Description: Backing line of dance and exit
DanceStep.Comment: Straight through on first slow, contra lead her onto right rail and step straight through on second slow (right). Pivot 1/2 turn right onto first quick and she follows. Exit: Step to right rail on first slow, right foot to rail on second slow. Follow her onto the track on the first quick.

DanceStep.Description: Side by side, inside turn exit
DanceStep.Comment: Lead like an inside turn, place her right hand into your right hand. Exit: Lead her accross to the center of the track (to the right) on the first slow (or even later), she turns (1/2 turn left) on the first quick.

DanceStep.Description: Ladies Wrap with outside turn exit
DanceStep.Comment: Lead like an inside turn, run my right hand down her left hand Exit: Lead her accross to the center of the track (to the right) on the first slow (or even later), she turns (1/2 turn left) on the first quick.

DanceStep.Description: Push away, man's wrap, inside turn exit
Push away, lady's pretzel, wheel, man goes under own arm, in
DanceStep.Comment: To do push away, just slow down. Twist right hand (with thumb on her hand) and raise left hand to get her to do an outside turn to hammerlock. Wheel until I'm facing line of dance. Raise left hand and step under my hand We are now left to right inside turn exit (lead at the end of the first slow) (Place hand on her back)
(egg beater)

First slow: Left step side so both feet are on left rail (start turning her) Second slow: Step between her feet (keep turning) First quick: Step side with left Second quick: Rotate and point right toe in new direction (Could be a full turn, or slightly less in a corner) NOTE: I rotate around her... she spins

DanceStep.Description: Inside turn, Wrap and Unwrap with outside turn
Backing, then forward line of dance
Push away, ladies pretzel, wheel, inside turn exit
DanceStep.Comment: Only one hand on Ladies pretzel

DanceStep.Description: Push away to pretzel, straight down line of dance, man under
DanceStep.Comment: Push away to pretzel, straight down line of dance, man under exit

DanceStep.Description: Prep lady: Forward / Side / spin turn, inside turn exit
DanceStep.Comment: First slow = prep forward, Second slow = body faces her (Spot her), 1/2 spin on first quick (facing away from her) (Spot forward line-of-dance), 3/4 spin on second quick (land heal-toe) (Spot her, then forward line of dance). Repeat

Side by side, cross body to lady's 1 1/2 right turn to window (right elbow down blocks). Wheel Man takes his two hands over his head (lady walks behind man) then split her hands back to side-by-side. Inside turn exit.

DanceStep.Description: Corner turn from backing line of dance
Lady's pretzel, man goes under, inside turn exit

DanceStep.Comment: Backing line of dance -> Lady's wrap -> outside turn -> immediately into a lady's pretzel, inside turn exit (on first slow) -> Man's turn (her right with his right, 1/2 turn left, pass hand to his left, continue)

DanceStep.Description: Lady's pretzel (her hand behind my head on wheel) i.t. exit
DanceStep.Comment: Got that - put her hand behind my head (make sure her hand is AROUND my shoulder)

DanceStep.Description: Side-by-side, OUTSIDE turn exit, hands over my head, close
Backing to wrap, OUTSIDE turn exit

DanceStep.Comment: Add: from side by side - "crank turns" - free spin the lady back to closed position, or inside turn back to closed.

DanceStep.Description: Under Arm Turn with Hand Change

DanceStep.Comment: Push basic with tuck out. Underarm turn, end with swivel anchor. Two sugars (one ending with a push, step anchor for ladies) Two hand tuck with wrap. unwrap and man goes under to his left. 1/2 underarm with tummy stop.
Add: full underarm turn and underarm again. Sugar with kick/cross over (lead like cha cha break). Then same sugar with hip bump exit, lady ends with left arm styling.

Same starting footwork as Two-Hand Tuck:
1 - Side rock, open, lead her through with right hand, start dropping right hand 2 - Contine leading her through, drop right hand and twist it so she knows to turn 3 - Raise left hand and halo her head (Tap left) 4 - Continue halo (Step across with left foot so I'm out of the slot) 5 - Lower left hand to signal end of turn 6 - Keep right hand palm to her hip, fingertip connection
Typical exit = Side pass (but no footwork after 2... anchor position)
Alternate finish 4 - Pizza Waiter 5 - Step under my arm 6 - Switch hands and grab her wrist (so I can do a side-pass)
Her footwork (regular tuck footwork?): 1 - Forward right 2 - Forward left 3 - 4 - 5 - 6 -

Catch under with right hand, left over man's head Tuck out. Sugar with scoup for the lady. My footwork is: 12 Side rock (lead her down slot) 34 Start turning her (stop her with your right hand so she doesn't travel too far) 5&6 Right hook behind, step side, step together Next: 12 Lead her back, and step forward 34 Tap step 56 Anchor in place

DanceStep.Description: Reverse whip with man's paddle turn
DanceStep.Comment:
Start with an underarm turn and switch my right to her right face her head-on. 1 - Left Side - Lead her straight forward lower right hand 2 - Right Forward - Twist right hand to turn her around 3 - Step Left - Change to closed basic position & - Step Right 4 - Step out left (Which would be sideway to our slot) - Closed basic, Right hand on her shoulder, left hand at MY forehead level. 5 - Forward (sideways) right - Lead her straight forward and step ACROSS to my left. 6 - Reach turn 90 deg left and Step onto left - prep for paddle turn 7 - Bring hand through and do spin (optionally double) (spot her face) 8 - Feet together to stop and catch her wrist to wrist
Follow with a side-pass.
DanceStep.LadysSteps: Her footwork: 1 - Forward right 2 - Forward pivot (turn left 90 deg) left 3 - back right & - Left together 4 - Right forward (in closed position) 5 - Left forward 6 - Turn right on right 7 - Anchor left 8 - Step together left

DanceStep.Comment: My left to both of her hands. 12 Draw her in like a sugar push, both her hands over my head. Hold her hips 3 Out 4 in Left hip 5 out 6 in Right hip Tuck out.
Push basic, tuck out, under arm, SET OPEN SUGAR, plain sugar w/Texas push.

DanceStep.Description: Free spin, inside roll to Man's head loop, Neck wrap, sling
DanceStep.Comment: FREE SPIN, under arm with hand change, INSIDE ROLL to man's HEAD LOOP, catch lady and send her down the slot, rock her back, tuck her out into lady's NECK WRAP, SLING SHOT and anchor, under arm.

DanceStep.Description: Catch under to Lady's neck wrap, sling out
DanceStep.Comment: CATCH UNDER into lady's neck wrap, sling shot out, sugar with two hands over man's head (and HIP BUMPS to tuck out or) lady slides out to open. Hip Bump: Sugar to 4 5 - out 6 - rt to rt bump 7 - out 8 - left to left bump 1 - send to right arm and do tuck

Under arm, man's right turn to TUNNEL: Underarm turn, I turn right into hammerlock, Sling out, sugar her hands over my head. (My left foot sweeps to jazz box) 1 = Rock 2 = Step 3 = Tap 4 = Step accross 5 = back 6 = Step accross 7 = Anchor & = in 8 = Place (Remember to keep both hands)

1,2 = Start sugar (hands go down) 3 = Kick left heal down 4 = Step (across and in front of right foot) onto left 5 = Kick right heal & = Step down (across) onto right 6 = Step left (next to right) & = Step back onto right (so you can start sugar on left on 1)

DanceStep.Description: Illusion face loop, man's full left spin
DanceStep.Comment: From tunnel - lady's two hands in man's one hand - ILLUSION Face Loop, catch lady's hips for hip bump, tuck out, man stays facing side into under arm turn, man's full left spin with triple hand change, side pass.

DanceStep.Description: Locked whip with Lady's REVERSE TURN, lady's outside turn
DanceStep.Comment: Locked whip start with lady's REVERSE TURN, to pretzel, lady's forward inside roll to normal exit (man continually crosses the slot.) Start as a whip, then 4 - keep left hand high and lead her back lady turns right 2 turns to lady's pretzel. to Exit: Send left hand across face and lady turns 1 turn left. Lead back holding left hand.
Her footwork is: 1 - Step back right & - Turn away 2 - Step forward left 3 - Turn toward me & - Forward left 4 - Side right

Basic Outside turn Pop her back and step side (back slightly, SMALL step forward, SMALL step side) ----Keep facing each other as you turn Hook, step, cross in front Step, hook, side Hook, step, Step apart ----Now exit with an outside turn Rock SLIGHTLY to left, rock back, step 2nd half of basic as she finishes turn
Outside turn with hand change - Walk around
Large flippies out of Walk Aroung to Closed

Prep with an Outside turn with hand change, pop lady back to Forward Outside Roll; change hand position to open palm facing left and APPLY pressure --- Rock step, step forward Walk around to face her --- hand change and pop her back to closed
1/2 Cha Cha break with two hand 'twister', end with outside turn.

DanceStep.Description: Peek-a-boo with overhead walk around to basic

DanceStep.Comment: Push Basic, Generic Whip w/Outside turn Man's headloop w/1 1/2 turn (twist to her, spot on her eyes) Texas Push (5 = Left, & = Right heal, 6 = Right, 7 = Left toe) NOTE: Katie and John showed us how to do 2 hand tuck over head slide down back, spin her left. NOTE: REMEMBER to lead for a possible double (for Pat) on tuck out.
Basic, little flippys. Remember to do toe heal on side step (to keep doing up and up) Also on Frame - Hips forward, ribcage up, shoulders back, arms forward, raise arms from shoulder blade.
Side on 1. Forward left on 2 (Leg straight, foot flat), back on 3 4 & = Side, Together (remember to roll feet from toes to flat) 5 = Side 6 = Rock back 7 & = Side Together 1 = Side (hips to side).

Man's head loop... Side pass w/ Tummy stop Side pass w/hook triple 5 (Right hook back while turning side, & left step forward [which is 90 deg], 6 right step forward, & pivot left) (Later: lead sugar out with) 1 - Kick & - Ball 2 - Change Pontiac: Underarm, switch hands right to right, peekaboo lead (left to left)... Locked whip footwork, 1,2 right hand up,3,4 = Hands spread 5 = Step toward her, 6 = Lead her back, right hand up, 7 = turn right under my arm 8 = into hammerlock.
Outside turn - Lead back on 3 Big Flippys - Push with left hand on count 5, lead her open with right

DanceStep.Description: Open Break, Outside turn, Traveling Basic
DanceStep.Comment: Open break - Cha - Cha - Turn - Lead level remember to keep other arm out To open basic: 2, 3 = Left forward, Right Back 4 & 5 = Left Back, Right Hook in Front, Left Back (Shoulders to Left). 6, 7 = Right Back, Left Forward 8 & 1 = Right Forward, Left Hook behind right, Right Forward (Shoulders to Left) Exit by leading an outside turn on 5, 6, 7 = Right Back, Left Forward 8 & 1 = Triple to the right (Back to closed) NOTE: LOOK AT your partner (head up)

Pontiac: Underarm, switch hands right to right, peekaboo lead (left to left)... Locked whip footwork, 1,2 right hand up,3,4 = Hands spread 5 = Step toward her, 6 = Lead her back, right hand up, 7 = turn right under my arm 8 = into hammerlock (make sure my right hand is low looped out/down. Exit: (she does locked whip footwork flat back forward and flatback back) (1 do 1,2 = rock step lead her thru, 3,4 = step across to right 5,6 = Step back lead her thru left side, 7,8 Anchor in place) ,then underarm turn.

Open basic, lead outside turn on exit, switch hands (right forward left on her back) Make sure my hand is over the top holding her wrist. Step forward (7 & 1). Slight left push (with my right to her right hand). Step forward and across to my right then back (2, 3). Triple step to the left (4 & 5) circle her elbow and slide to her hand. 6 7 & 1 repeat. Right hand high for outside (1 1/2) turn. (2, 3, 4 & 5) to basic.

Outside turn lead stop with my hand over hers pop her back draw my left hand into my (right) chest turn around 3/4 turn (she turns 1/4) tight feet (I circle around left foot) Have right arm out to go into basic continue basic.

DanceStep.Description: Locked whip with unwrap, to tuck w/inside turn
DanceStep.Comment: Do a locked whip. on return (5=same, 6) release right hand and unwrap and then continue the turn by raising your hand to lead an outside turn (7, 8). Now you are his right to her left. Side rock and start a tuck (with his left hand), but lead an inside turn (instead of an ouside turn which is usual for a tuck).

123 = forward basic 456 = back basic (6=wind up) 1 = step (her left arm out, I connect my right forearm to her left blade) 2 = pivot 3 = left hook behind right 4 = elvis 5 = draw foot in 6 = side (hands are left to right)

DanceStep.Description: Rotating Cross Body to Man's Headloop
DanceStep.Comment: Right to Right 123 = Rotating crossbody (3 = stop to wind her up) & = breath arm up slightly 4 = Crank garden hose 5, 6 = Her right arm over my shoulder 1-6 = Rotating crossbody

DanceStep.Description: Rotating Cross Body to 2 hands to Man's Headloop
DanceStep.Comment: Right to right, Left to Left peekaboo 1-6 Same as headloop except keep right hand 1-3 On crossbody, take left hand over my head with my left hand. 4-6 rest of crossbody lead

Two Hand Tuck On 3 Hands high (lead back hard) 4, 5, 6 Over her head and down (Hands together right over left). 1 - Slide right to elbow 2 - Right over her head 3 - Left over my head 4 - Pull my left hand into my chest (keep hands flat through these moves) 5 - Hard quick circle to lead her in a spin. 6 - Catch my left to her right

Outside turn Right to Right handshake, Left to Left peekaboo lead. Rock (lt), Step (rt), Step forward (lt), Pivot (lead with lower hand) On Exit take her right hand (my right) to my ribs, turn right Left hand over my head and place her left hand on my shoulder (same as walkaround lead)

Outside turn, change right to right. 2, 3 = Forward break 4 & 5 = Draw right hand to my chest and then to right to turn her into my arm (you should have both hands) Pattern: 6 = Point (inside = right) 7 = step (right) 8 = cha (walk left) & = cha (walk right) 1 = turn (around onto your left) & = together (next step will be point = left) 2 = Point (inside = left) 3 = step (left) 4 = cha (walk right) & = cha (walk left) 5 = turn (around onto your right) & = together (next step will be point = left) To Exit: 6 = Point (right) 7 = Step (right) 8 = Walk (left) & = Walk (right) = Lead her with your right arm forward, let go with your left hand free spin her with your right.

x-body lead to open (left to right) 1 - Slight forward break 2, 3 - Draw her toward you, catch her with your right hand (progressive lead) 4 - Hook 5 - Elvis 6 - Slide foot accross (for more rotations, repeat 4,5=hook Elvis, 6 & = hook Elvis - better to count beats) (for more rotations [Bridgett], repeat 4,5=hook Elvis, 6 1 = hook Elvis) Scallop: 1 back break (twist her in) 2 Side slightly (twist her back to facing you) 3 Side 4 Forward break (with right foot forward) (twist her in) 5 Side 6 Side (Follow with a cucharacha)

Crossbody to two hands Small back break, cumbia side (123 same as natural top) Left hand up, Twist right hand down as she spins, right hand ends up on her hip. (456) Push hip for wind-up (1) Lead hand across her face to unwind (23) Rotate in open with two hands (456)

To start, underarm turn 456 - Turn Left, switch hands so you are R-R and L-L. Swivel (forward right), Swivel (forward left), Point, (right) Step (back right), Hook Triple. (Lead right hand forward first time, then left hand forward after that [move with hips]) to exit: Raise left hand and spin her left. Lower hand when she is facing you (hands on left) and rip her around (to left) You spin left and catch your left to her right. (good place to do a hip bump) or Just: Turn 1/2 left after 6 and start a sugar push. Swivel, Swivel, turn left, (you have the wrong hand, but you can switch)
Basics: 1: Tight left leg, compress push forward land heal toe over left foot 2: Push up onto right foot 3: Up onto left toes Gently rotate left (step slight right on 1)

Basic closed: Triple left, Triple right, rock step (partnership rotates right on triple steps) To open: on rock step push her out, keep a connection with her right hand. To close: On rack back pull her to closed. Underarm turn: 5,6 rock back 1 & 2 drop right hand draw left hand to right shoulder rotate hand to face her. 3 & 4 over her head 5 6 - Rock back, get other hand She turns, he turns: Same+ 3 & 4 - Put my thumb in her hand, go thru window and turn around 5 6 - Rock back Then do underarm turn since my hands are upside down. I spin: 1 & 2 - Place my right hand on top of her right hand, turn left 3 & 4 - Hook my left hand into her right hand. 5 6 - Rock back

DanceStep.Description: Roll and Lock to My Underarm Exit
DanceStep.Comment:
1 - Side 2 - Forward 3 - Side (Same as natural top so far) 4 - Hook right back 5 - STEP LEFT FORWARD (and go under own arm) 6 - Close and face her (Usually you start another natural top from here)
Also Getting the difference between Natural Top and Stop and Go

DanceStep.Description: Underarm cuddle? to his Underarm cuddle
DanceStep.Comment: Same steps as natural top, just keep my right as long as possible and slide down her left after turn. 123 - Side, forward, side = wind up, lead cuddle w/left, drop right my right reconnects and slides down her left. You are now r-l l-r. 456 - Hook, forward, side = (1) My right hand up and hook, (2) - Forward and turn under my own right arm (left arm to body, she slides hand around my body) (3) - Her left slides down my right arm. You are now r-l l-r. AND repeat.

Similar to sugar: Only with left hand (to her r) 1 - Step back left 2 - Step right foot right and lead her right (point foot 90 deg) (like cha cha break) 3 - Lift left foot and hip-bump 4 - Step across with left foot 5 - Paddle with right foot 6 - Step with right foot Cheek bump variation 2 - Lead her forward and to the right (she spins left)
Signal just before 1

123 = Outside turn 456 = Walk around +123 = Walk around My left hand over her right, wave with my Right (should be progressing forward) 4 - Step across to left with right foot 5 - Step side with left foot (Right hand over her head then back down) 6 - pivot front and step with right foot 123 - Same Exit (she is on my right): 1 - Draw my right hand to my stomach 2 - Spin her by sending my hand backwards 3 = Catch her with my left 456 = Back half of basic

Underarm turn 5 6 - Back, then Lead her forward into my right arm 1&2 - Walk forward (left, right, left) 3&4 - Walk forward (right, left, right) 56 - Walk Walk (forward) (left, right) 1&2 - Walk forward 3&4 - Walk forward 5 6 - Open her up (to the right) (now do a tuck) 1&2 3&4 56 Rock back and do an underarm turn

From open 3&4 - Left hand leads inside turn (keep right and low) 5&6 - Lead into cuddle 12 - Rock back to exit: 3&4 - Crank her out to her left 5&6 - Turn her (for double put your left hand close to your face, crank) Then do underarm turn since left hand is upside down.
Start with a Basic Box Basic Box, Open with right hand on 456. Dance forward 123 456 123 Close on 456.
Keep turning!
Open, closed basics Triple step tap and step single step
also reminder that basic rotates right

1 = Forward 2 = Slight Forward step in place 3 = Change weight only onto left foot (Start rotating her right) 4 = Step across and forward 5 = Step in place 6 = Change weight onto right foot (turn her left)
Underarm turn: 5,6 rock back 1 & 2 drop right hand draw left hand to right shoulder rotate hand to face her. 3 & 4 over her hand. 5 6 - Rock back, get other hand
Same as underarm turn+ 3 & 4 - Put my thumb in her hand, go thru window and turn around 5 6 - Rock back Then do underarm turn since my hands are upside down.
1 & 2 - Place my right hand on top of her right hand, turn left 3 & 4 - Hook my left hand into her right hand. 5 6 - Rock back

DanceStep.Description: Roll and Lock to Natural Top
Exit Natural Top with Step Around
DanceStep.Comment: 4 - Hook behind (normal) 5 - Step forward (and go under your own arm) 6 - Turn toward her (left turn)

1 - Start underarm turn (Angle rock back) 2 - Roll and Lock (Put back side of hand on her back while changing her direction with the other hand) (Step forward) 3 - Turn her around and start her forward (step side) 4 - Begin halo lead 5 - Halo her head (as she push paddles) 6 - Bring her hand down (to her shoulder level) to stop her.
1 - Forward 2 - Open to right (contra body) 3 - Walk forward 4 - Forward 5 - Close up 6 - Continue Closing 1 - Back to basic

1&2 - Both turn left (start bringing hands over heads) 3&4 - Hands over heads, slide down 56 - Rock (you are right to right) 1& 2 - Slight lead to left 3 - Lead to right and let go (she spins) &4 - She spins 56 - Catch left to her right, rock

DanceStep.Description: Generic Whip to Tuck to Reverse Whip to Twist
DanceStep.Comment: Generic Whip: On 78 - Man spins right (hook right behind) now Right to Right (his hand palm facing up) Tuck: 12 Catch under with l-l 3 456 She spins twice (Illusion turn=Hold her right, left hand on wrist) Now r-r, l-l Reverse Whip: 12 Lead her forward, twist right hand down 34 56 Inside turn - Hand high 78 Drop hand and change hands around her back Now she is wrapped Twist 12 Hip twist 34 Hip Twist 56 Inside turn 78 Anchor in Place

DanceStep.Description: Walk around to inside turn to his turn
DanceStep.Comment: 1234 = Walk around (I turn to left) (My left to her left) 5678 = Inside turn (right turn for her) 1234 = I turn (my right = opposite to her) 5678 = Basic
1234 - Turn to right (on 2 and 4, turn right foot 90 deg to right) 5678 - Turn to left (bring left foot behind right)

From open 1234 = Raise my left hand and walk under Place right hand on her left hip and wrap around to her right hip Grab her left hand with my left 5678 = Walk her forward 1234 = Outside turn (turn her left with my left hand) 5678 = I turn to my ?left?

Start of Generic Whip: 1234 5 - Shift to left while bringing lady through 6 - Step back onto right as she goes through slot 78 - Same 90 - Same 12 - Exit: Underarm turn 34 - Rip her around to her left 56 Anchor in Place

After Guaperia: Note: this is Pendulum footwork 1 - Lead SLIGHTLY back (do not drop hand) (in place) 2 - Lead forward (small) 3 - Lead forward (large) 4 - Turn toward partner press right hand to her left, hook right foot back 5 - Step (partnership going backwards) 6 - Step back slightly with right while turning the same direction as partner Repeat... To Exit: 4 - push out sightly 56 spot turn away from partnership

3&4 - Outside turn 56 - Rock back 1&2 - Move hand to right and tap her back 3&4 - Move hand to stomach and she taps my back no 56, 1&2 and 3&4 = repeat Exit: 1&2 - Same dont tap 3&4 - Rip her around to her right 56 - Catch w/my left, rock back

xbody to: 123 1st half mambo basic 456 lead with right - lady's right turn + lower hand to wrap around her back 123 (change of place) Rock her back, then forward (to face to face) 456 Hook my right foot and spin right once My hands on her shoulders (now do coca cola) 123 (cross body footwork) 456 end my right hand on her right shoulder (facing same way) to ??? 123 (cross body footwork) (lead her forward then side) 4 5 ( My right hand on her left shoulder to change her direction) 6 she spins (left) to face me.

Move leg like pendulum Forward: Brush toe and strike (lightly) with heal Back: Brush heal and strike with toe Slow - Forward left Slow - Forward right Quick - Brush side (left) Quick - Together (right)
Slow - Forward (left) Slow - Side (right foot to the right) Quick - Together (left) Quick - Together (right)

Slow Slow - Turn slightly right Quick Quick Slow - Open the partnership and step forward (left) Slow - Step forward (right) Quick - Close the partnership and step side (down the line of dance) Quick - Close (repeat)
change timing to: Slow - Forward left Quick - Brush and step side Quick - Together Slow - Back Right Quick - Brush and step side Quick - Together

1234 Basic 5678 Basic (move to left hand over right) 1234 I spin right 360 deg (right hand over head) 5678 Woman's headloop while leading her (my) backwards. 1234 Open to left and twist her hand down so she turns around to face you (my right hand is on her left hip holding her right hand behind her back) 5678 basic 1234 Lead her forward while opening to the right 5678 Inside (her right) turn 1234 My (right) inside turn 5678 My headloop 1234 Natural+ 5678 +Top (to right) close position 1234 Basic 5678 Walkaround (I turn left) 1234 Inside (her right) turn lead with my left to her left 5678 My inside (right turn) to two hands 1234 Inside turn with two hands Left hand leads her forward and turn her left (face to face) 5678 Turn to right and bring my hands in front of me 1234 Spread feet and lead her in to my back and change hands to r-r, l-l 5678 Wiggle and bring hands out to side 1234 Lead her backwards 5678 Walk out, turn around and back to closed

1: Normal Chg hands man's headloop, rotating x-body 2: Two hands Do not bring her head over my head on: 789 Her hand over my head 012 Finish rotating crossbody 3: to Woman's headloop 789 Her hand over her head 012 Finish crossbody 4: to My headloop 789 My hand over my head 012 Same

Basic throwout: triple, triple side pass, inside turn (similar and same direction as tuck)
Basic difference: 12 (small rock step), replace 3&4 Triple step 5&6 Triple step
Sugar or Underarm turn difference: 1&2 - Kick ball change
Sugar push breaks: ON1: 12 - Jump back 34 flex legs to move hips 56 repeat
12 - Leg to side 3456 - Draw back in
ON3: 3 Press forward 456 - Outside turn or 456 - Slide back
ON5: Jump or Leg to side or 12 OUT OUT, 34 rotate hips

SMALLER STEPS! on 23, do a back break (leading with the opposite hand as a forward break)
Do an open hand to change to a forward break and back
To lead a spot turn: 1234&567 Closed 8&1 keep and drop left hand 23 Break BACK (small) 4&5 Raise left hand to lead turn 67 - She spot turns 8&1 - cha cha side to right
Also: Spot turn from open break (I can also do spot turn)

123456 X-Body to hand change (l-l) 123456 Underarm turn (catch under) 123456 Sombrero Right hand on her left shoulder Coca-cola: 1 back (right) 2 forward 3 Forward 4 Pivot (her) (roll and lock) 5 back 6 back Rotating cross body: 123 Step forward, pivot, back (while rotating) 456 Elvis, cross, side
X-Body to Hange change Underarm turn (hammerlock) X Body (keep left hand) and roll and lock Man's headloop (raise hammerlocked/my left hand) Rotating crossbody turn

Rotating x-body Spin her around to roll and lock: 1 - Rock slightly (forward for her [draw lead]) (then left with my left so she turn) and then right (this will spin her) [step inside] 2 - Get knife edge on her back and roll [pivot back] 3 - lock [back] 456 - Elvis cross side Rotating x-body
Coca-cola to Roll and Lock to Rotating x-body
Forward Left Change, Change Change Back Right Change Change Change
Side Left Behind right, lift left, side right Behind left
From Whisk 1 Turn down line of dance Forward back back Forward back back exit on forward inside (forward side together)
Basic, turning left (counter clockwise)

From left over right: (from Hector's substitute) Start r-r l-l left hand over 123 Same as xbody lead 4 Small step, lead her straight forward 5 Large step next to her 6 step together My left hand is on her right shoulder, right hand in front (in her right) 123 Walk across the front of her I am now on her left. My left hand is on her left hip, right hands in front 456 Lead outside (leftward) turn for her to hood ornament position 123 I break front right and lead her the opposite way (by pulling back on her left hand) 456 I break front left and turn her (rightward) once. Now switch hands (my left holding her right on top) I Spin once to right: 1 Step forward 2 pivot toward back 3 turn and step together 456 Lower right hand and spin around hers twice Catch my left to her right.

Traveling: Slow, Slow (forward forward) Quick, Quick (side together) Box: Slow (forward) Quick, Quick (side together) Twinkle: Slow = Forward Quick = Side Quick = Side Turn her to my left and I turn (promenade position) Slow = Step forward Quick = Together Quick = Pivot

Traveling: 1 (forward) 2, 3 (side together) Box: 1 (forward) 2, 3 (side together) Twinkle: 1 = Forward 2 = Side 3 = Side Turn her to my left and I turn (promenade position) 1 = Step forward 2 = Together 3 = Pivot

Basic. On 1 I back break, wind her up for turning cumbia 2 Send her hand down 3 her hand behind her back 456 Same on other side to Exit: 123 - Raise right hand and bring over her head (now you are facing same way r-r l-l (right over) Options out: Double faceloop or Lead her behind me so I am hammerlocked (We are r-r l-l she is behind me) We are doing curving cumbias I'm in front before 1 (she is behind on my left monving to my right, switch right to palm up, pizza waiter) 123 Hand over my head 456 Open break 123456 - Sombrero

1234 Closed 5678 Open 1234 Cuddle 5678 Rotate right in cuddle position 1234 Inside turn to hammerlock 5678 Walk backwards 1234 Walk around the front of her 5678 Turn right one time 1234 Her Faceloop 5678 Turn away r-r 1234 Walk forward 5678 Walk forward 1234 Turn around, press open palms walk her back 5678 Keep walking 1234 Spread legs pull her in, elbows on outside of her elbows 5678 Slide hands down to her ribs, wiggle, push her back 1234 Open position Left over right walk around her right side (my left) 5678 Turn once to my hammerlock 1234 Tunnel (turn slightly left) 5678 Tunnel 1234 Natural Top 5678 Natural Top 1234 I turn left (same pattern as before) 5678 Inside turn for her 1234 Inside turn for me 5678 Basic

First: Always remember lead on 1 and release pressure for rest. Generic Whip breaks: ON3: Step side, wiggle hips, lead out an underarm turn ON5: Push her back (and step back yourself) Alternate steps in place. ON7: Any normal breaks: OUT OUT Rotate hips or Foot lunge or Hop back (you had to bend knees on 6)
23 Forward break 4&5 I open 6 Lead her forward and give her a hug 7 turn her 8&1 Side

67 Back break 8&1 Open, keep left to right 2 I step back and make her step back 3 Have her step forward and lead (almost) inside turn 4&5 Cha Cha past her and stop her with right hand 67 Step forward (close in front of her) 8&1 Cha Cha back to start
To repeat: Open break on 23
To finish: Step toward her instead of away on 23

Start l-l 123 First half of x-body 456 Lead in large circle to my left side (she does 3 pivots) to pizza waiter 123 Lead over my head (so she crosses to my right) 456 Free spin the lady 123 Rotating x-body 456 Rotating x-body

123 x-body 456 Start of forward break (but do not progress) 123 Spin her back to other way (now l-l r over shoulder) 456 Lead in a circle (almost man headloop) 1 = Step forward under headloop 23 - Rotating x-body 456 Rotating x-body
Slow Quick Quick Forward Left - Cross to side, Close Finish Box

123 Basic 4 Side right 5 Back break - Send her back 6 Forward - Lead turn (left hand up, right hand straight out) 123 Cumbia (as she spot turns) (1=side 2=cumbia, 3=step) 456 Cumbia (as she cumbias) (1=side 2=cumbia, 3=step) 123 Turn 90 deg and turn her to face me (1=hug so she faces me, 23=side,together)
123 Basic 4 Side right 5 Step through 6 Back to face her 123 Same other side to Exit Raise hand on 3 for underarm turn

Basic 1234 Forward 5678 Back (lady forward) to open 12345678 Arms out to side and front, palms together, rotate Disco Turns: 1234 Lead right over her head (she turns) 5678 Lead left over my head and leave right on my midsection (I turn, she doesn't) Both rotate: 1234 Right down, left up, rotate 5678 Circle both hands above her head 1234 Both of her hands over my head 5678 Slide down to hands Other: 1234 Start or rotate (Right down, left up) Put left on her back and lead her around my back turn her once and then into salsa style cumbia

From open, holding 2 hands: 123 Prep her back with my left hand, then across her face and over her head (I do a curving cumbia behind her) 456 Lead her behind me and do a curving cumbia in front of her
OR: on 456: Go to pizza waiter and do a hook turn (try to get in front of her on 3 - do a level 2 cumbia)

1: Normal (Lunge or Jump back) 3: Stop: Right hand down, left hand up and down to her shoulder, press left foot down Drop right (lower hand) and On count to 6, slowly draw right foot under left (send her to the end of the slot) 5: Place hand across her back and step with right foot accross slot (her) Slowly release her down the slot 7: Either: Lunge or outout on 7 or: on 5 roll her out and lunge or outout or hop back on 7 and then: Free spin her out or Side pass her.

XBody, change hands 23 FORWARD break 4&5 Left hand leads across (to right) and up slightly (landing on her shoulder) 67 I Forward break at a 45 deg angle to my left and she back breaks 8&1 Lead her across to my left side repeat Exit: When she is on my right raise left hand as she if going left and step toward her. You are now Left over right: Continue: Mine and her head loops Also: In shadow position, walk around her: 67 - Walk(r) Walk(l) 8&1 - Walk(r), Hook Under(l), Step(r) 2 - Step forward (l) (lead her back) 3 - Step back (r) (lead her in front of you) 4&5 - Cha Cha Side in place 6+ - Second half of cross body lead

From last week: 123 l-l Lead in to x-body 456 Loop hand (she pivots to my left) 123 Pass her hand to my right 456 Spin her into my right hand 123 Step across my front, Turn her so she is on my left, start her spinning back 456 Spin her so my hand is on her right hip 123 Walk her across my back 456 Spin her back across my front
r-r wave l-l 12 = Sugar lead 34 Inside turn (her left) (2 hands over) 56 I turn right under my right hand, left = hammerlock (now setup for tunnel)
r-r l-l 123 456 123 Right hand up - I turn 360 right in my hammerlock 456 123 Right hand over her head then down to back to back spreadeagle 456 release left and then Free spin her

DanceStep.Description: Fancy over the head stuff to wierd tunnel
DanceStep.Comment: r-r l-l left over right 123 She turns right, 2 hands over left hand up 456 Lead her across back into tunnel position (my hammerlock) 123 I rotate right (by hooking right behind left) She duck in then out of the tunnel How do I get out of this wierd hammerlock? maybe cross-body lead

From sweetheart position: Pattern 1 (twice) (basic cha-cha): 1 Break forward 2 Break back 3&4 walk back 56 Break back 7&8 Walk forward Pattern 2 (twice) (Turn): 12 Lead her around (to her left) with my right so she is facing me. 3&4 bow 56 Lead her back (to her right) with my left hand to sweetheart 7&8 Pattern 3 (twice) (Pivots): 12 Reach turn (to right) 3&4 Cha Cha 56 Reach turn (to left) (facing same way as 12 reach) 7&8 Cha Cha Pattern 4 (twice) (forward progression): 12 Walk walk 3&4 walk walk walk 56 Walk walk 7&8 walk walk walk Pattern 5 (twice) (lady circles): 12 I hook behind then step side to right as she crosses in front toward left 3&4 She triples behind (I raise left hand, release right as waist and re-capture right behind back) 56 I hook right in front as she travels to right behind my back 7&8 Raise right hand so she can go under

Two hands: 123 He: Forward, Back, back Wind her up with your right hand then stop (the draw lead) 4 She left pivots (right hand low, left hand above head w/1 finger) 5 She left pivot 6 She steps forward left Right hand on her hip, left in front 1 Step her forward 2 Follow her hip around and halo her head (pivot) 3456 - pivot, pivot, pivot, side 123 Cumbia 456 Cumbia
ALSO: Rotator: l-l 123 X-Body (same as) 456 Wind garden hose as she pivots into left shoulder 123 He pivots across 456 She pivots to open

12345678 Basic 1234 Natural top to right 5678 Now lead her behind you and sha-say to right (you are now my left to her right both facing the same way [90 deg from hands]) 1234 Spin her into me, stop with my hand on her shoulder 5678 I rotate 360 deg to right, changing hands 12345678 Basic in open 1234 Change of place- draw her into my left, my left over her shoulder, then turn her 90 deg with my right 5678 I turn (right?) and unwind hands 12345678 Basic (change to r over l) 1234 Lead her forward to right 5678 her hands over my head, change hands and 1234 draw her in and wiggle 5678 Send her out, turn around

123 - me: "Level 2 curving Cumbia" to closed position. Her: Back, Side, cross in front Left hand keeps her on my right; Right connection in through the arm (and somewhat to her back) 456 - Me = Hook (with twist); Side (with twist); Hook. Her: Cross in front; Side; Cross in front 123 - Me = Side, Hook, Side
Exits: 456 - Me = Hook; Side, Cross in front (and open the lady) or 456 - Me = Hook; Step forward (my hand over my head); Step around (facing her)
78 = Spin right (lady catches hand)

Swivel (r), Swivel (l) on 78
On Sugar: 1 = Kick ball & = Back (l) 2 = Step (r)

DanceStep.Description: Coca Cola to Roll and Lock to Rotator
DanceStep.Comment: 123 - Start of crossbody, but I start rotating out 4 - Place my left hand on her right shoulder and she does cross-body footwork (actually she will pivot 3 times) 5 - Place my right hand on her right shoulder blade and push her around the corner (with knife edge hand) 6 - Rotate her to face me (with my right hand) Rotator 1 - Step forward to her left - Pivot left (into her left arm) Turn head left to watch for clearing (left foot) 2 - Step back (We are both facing the same direction) (right foot) 3 - Hook left foot behind 4 - Elvis right foot (Make sure you rotate your hips to keep rotating) 5 - Cross in front (left) 6 - Side (right) Notes: Small steps, make sure you rotate her on 6 so she doesn't get away

DanceStep.Description: Generic Whip Variation - Send her out on 4
DanceStep.Comment: 123 Same 4 - My left foot up (send her out) (Keep facing side - outside slot) 5 - Left arm rock solid, lunge to left bent leg, right leg out straight 678 - Hold her there

123 - Forward basic 456 - My left hand high, she turnsto her right 123 - I turn to my right (pizza waiter, on 2 set her right hand on my right shoulder and I continue to turn to face her. 456 - Duck under her hand to move it to my left shoulder

123 - Cross body lead 456 - Like lead to crossover, but step in place and lead my left hand to my left pocket. 123 - Lead her to turn around slowly (to her right), I progress to my left and turn 90 deg. 1 Back, 2 Forward, 3 Step, & Tap (right) Now I have my right hand on her right shoulder and my left hand palm to palm (mine facing out/up) to my front/left 456 - Lead her into a single inside (left) turn. My footwork - Elvis, cross, side. 123 - Switch sides she goes from my left to my right - Send hand over the top. My left hand is in her right hand. (cross, step, side) 456 - Roll her into my right side. (lead in then block on 5) 1 - Step her forward to start outside (her right) turn. 23456 - Lead her around 2 1/2 to right. Back to basic

Same-------- 123 - Cross body lead 456 - Like lead to crossover, but step in place and lead my left hand to my left pocket. 123 - Lead her to turn around slowly (to her left), I progress to my left and turn 90 deg. (4 - cross in front to right, 5 - step side, 6 - Step across Now I have my right hand on her right shoulder and my left hand palm to palm (mine facing out/up) to my front/left 456 - Lead her into a single inside turn. My footwork - Elvis, cross, side. -------- 123456 My rotator
Roll her in and tilt her on my hip. Roll her out.

Like underarm turn... Switch hands (right-left) 1 - Open to side rock; lead her down the slot 2 - 3 - Lead inside (her right turn) Over her head then down 4 5 6 - Right hand is pressed against her right on her back, left hand is holding her left in front. ... start prance: 7 - Lead her left 8 - Right 1234 5 Lead her into inside (left) turn 6 Bring hand down 7 Free spin her to her (left) 8 Catch my left to her right

Enter from last week's move, or: From closed,123456 closed cumbia; 123456 Open cumbia ----------------- 123 Open her up r-l (both facing the same way) (I do left foot progressive, she does right foot progressive) 4 Lead down and in front of me 56 so she pivots (I do 4 right foot, 5 progress, 6 - side (pivoting action to side) 1 - Turn her right and then lead her forward across my front. (I do Elvis with my left) 2 - Turn her right into my left hip (I cross in front) 3 - Lead her down to do Pivot, (I Elvis) 4 Pivot, 5 Pivot, 6 Side (Cross, Elvis, Side)

DanceStep.Description: Change of Place with Hook Turn
DanceStep.Comment: r-r l-l over (thumb turned down) 1 Wind her up for change of place 23 She pivots, both hands over her head 456 elbows up, I hook turn 1 Faceloop with my right and start x-body lead 2 Put her left arm over my head 3456 X-Body lead
12 Same as underarm turn 3 - Place left hand on her right shoulder to stop her 4 - Apply pressure on right (lead hand) to start her turning 56 - Lead her in right turn (single or double)
Same as regular sugar except: On 56 or 78 spin right (keep left hand) ready for tunnel.

DanceStep.Description: Styling - Sailor shuffle, Sweeps on underarm turn
DanceStep.Comment:
Sailor shuffle - on any anchor, step behind on 5. Be sure to turn hips, not shoulders. 1 - Hook (and step back) and turn 90 deg & - Step FORWARD (which is sideways to the slot) 2 - Step forward and (pivot) 90 deg to face her
Also on underarm turn sweep feet on 34 and 56

Basic 1 - Lead her back slightly (I start a level 2 cumbia) 2 - Lead her forward, start making her turn toward me 3 - Face her in closed position 4 - Hook behind (she steps between my feet) Keep turning by rotating my hips 5 - Elvis (she crosses in front) Keep rotating 6 - Hook 7 - Elvis 8 - Hook 9 - Elvis 10 - Hook 11 - Elvis 12 - Cross in front to open her up. --------(Start hip twist exit)-------- 1 - Rotate and press forward (she will be in same position) 2 - Lead her forward (for her) and turn her in 3 - Lead her forward (after turing her back) 456 - Cross body lead exit. (or inside turn exit) --------Roll and Lock entrance------- 1 - Lead her back 2 - Lead her to cumbia (same as change of place lead) and put right knife edge on her back 3 - Roll and lock (and rotate myself about 180 deg) continue Natural top --------Wrap entrance--------- Two hands: 1 - Lead her back (same as cuddle lead)

Spreadeagle, but instead of free spin: 4 - Lower left hand / Left foot forward and to the left (of her) 5 - Step forward on right 6 - Turn right 90 deg and step slightly behind her on left
1 - Hook right behind while sending her out 2 - face her and step on left ?

1: 1 - Step forward slightly 2 - Step back 3 - Step back and slightly to my left (raise left hand and turn it to face her and start winding her up for turn [cross body footwork for her]) 4 - Hook behind (she turns left) 5 - Side 6 - Cross in front (so I follow her) Exit 1: Pizza waiter 123 - I spot turn and left her side on 3 456 - She spot turns Exit 2: Pizza waiter 123 - I Reach turn and place her right hand on my left shoulder when I turn away 456 - Reach turn back to face her
2: 1 2 3 - Step back and to my right I can either lead her down the slot and back on 1 or I can turn her on 5 and do change-of-place on the next measure to get her back
3: With two hands From two hands open lead her to do cross-body and take both of my hands over her head: 123 - Cross body with 2 hands open, lead wind-up on 3 456 - 2nd Half of cross-body end with hands crossed 123 - Basic with hands crossed 456 - Hook turn to unwind
Remember to articulate the feet. Transitions are on 6. Be sure to do cuban motion. On 1 try to move to a running stance.

123 - Basic 45 - right basic 6 - Side - Drop right hand from back, left hand to her waist level. 1 - Lead her to cumbia back 2 - She steps forward 3 - Lead side (hand at her forehead level... her arm is parallel with the ground) Hand hand position to flat hand pressing down on her hand 4 - Continue to lead her side 5 - Halo her head 6 - Lower hand and start forward to resume basic

123 Left basic 45 - Right basic 6 - Lower (and keep both hands) 1 - Lead her with my left to cumbia 2 - raise and flip left hand in hers 3 - She finishes curving cumbia, my right hand on her hip, left in front of her I lead her out of this with my forearm on her back 4 - She steps back 5 - Raise left hand 6 - Step toward her back to basic

DanceStep.Description: Right to Right Underarm w/Waterfall Exit
DanceStep.Comment:
123 - Basic 4 5 Change hands (r-r) 6 - Side
123 - Lead cumbia + side step 456 - Lead spot turn right elbow down to stop turn
1 - Brush right (her left ear) 23 - Continue cumbia 456 - Opposite side
123 - Brush 4 - Raise elbow and send over her head 5 - she turns 90 deg to her left 6 - grab top of her left hand with my left (my right hand across her back on on her shoulder)
Do two progressives (as she does a left pivot) 1 - Back 2 - Forward 3 - Forward Wind her up: 4 - Back (she steps forward and pivots) 5 - Forward 6 - Forward (to basic)

DanceStep.Description: Cross Overs (cha cha breaks) w/spot turn exit
Two hand Cross Body to Cuddle Position & Pivots out
Change of Place with Hook Turn
DanceStep.Comment: From open lead change of place (wind up on 1) 1 - Wind up with left (I start level 2 cumbia) 2 - Left across her face 3 - Left over her head (finish cumbia) Left hand in pizza waiter 456 - Hook turn

DanceStep.Description: Two hands over with Hook Turn
DanceStep.Comment: From open lead change of place (wind up on 1) 1 - Wind up with left (I start level 2 cumbia) 2 - Left across her face 3 - Both hands over her head (finish cumbia) (Left hand in pizza waiter, right hand holding her hand on my left shoulder) Lead with left elbow across 456 - Hook turn (let go with right hand)

From two hands open, lead windup with left. Left hand over her head, right hand across her back and down her left arm. 123 - Level one cumbia Lead my windup (for a left turn) with my right hand (elbow in) 456 - Level one cumbia (for a change of place) repeat Exit with two hands over on 123 + a hook turn on 456

123 - Lead level one cumbia and put her on your right hip (my right hand on her right hip, left on her left shoulder) 456 - Cumbia back so she in in my left pocket repeat, or raise right hand to: 123 - Two hands over (same as previous move) 456 - Hook turn for exit
After sending her down the slot, turn away l-r Duck under her arm, then back
Generic Whip - same 1234 Nail right foot into ground Turn then step, bringing her in and out Exit with inside turn
From open, backing line of dance. 1st Slow: I turn left 90 deg; put my right hand on top of her right hand 2nd Slow: I turn left 90 deg; put my left hand in her right hand Resume closed

DanceStep.Description: Man's turn from backing line of dance

DanceStep.Comment: Q - Open her to my right (by SHIFTING LEFT) Q - She opens into my right arm --- Continue down line of dance I can switch her by hooking left on QQ I can switch or close to backing line of dance on SS

In Sweetheart: Q - I hook back and lead her to turn left in front of me Q - She in facing backing line of dance on my left S - Keep her turning left around my back S - She turns into crossbow position on my right. --- Now I lead her to double left turn with my RIGHT hand Q - Turn her 90 deg Q - Turn her 90 deg S - Turn her 90 DEG and SWITCH hands to L-R S - Turn her 90 deg and lower hand, roll and lock with my right.

DanceStep.Description: Natural Top With Hip Twist Exit
DanceStep.Comment: From open position, left to right, hooked hand position 123 - Level 2 Turning Cumbia to Closed (I lead her to 1 - Step back slightly, 2 - Step forward and wind her up to my left, 3 open her up so she faces me), left hand pressures her right hand in. 456 - Hook, Side, Hook (Be sure to Make a 7 on hook and rotate on side) (Be sure to pull her with my lead (left) hand) 123 - Side, Hook, Side 456 - Hook, Side (don't rotate as much to open her up), Cross in front. ------------Hip Twist exit---------- 1 - Rotate and press into my left foot (lead down toward her hip with my left) (She should be in mirror position as she steps back right) 2 - Create a wall and lead her to swivel in front of me on her left foot (about her shoulder level) 3 - Maintain the wall and lead ler to swivel back (to face toward my left) 456 - End of cross body lead

From open: 123456 - Cross body in open 123 - Start cross body (in open) and lead inside turn (her left turn) 456 - She executes inside turn to cuddle. 123 - I step back (while leaning forward) so she continues turning forward 456 - Unwind her 1 1/2 turns (right) to hammerlock 123 - Basic in Hammerlock 456 - Unwind her and I turn 90 deg right to open basic

From open (no connection): 123 - Cumbia 456 - Cumbia (wind up on 6) 1 - Step forward to her left 2 - Pivot Left She should open her left arm and I wrap my right arm around her back connection is through the upper arm 3 - Step back and start to rotate (forces her to step forward right) LOOK LEFT 4 - Elvis (she steps between my feet with left) 5 - Cross 6 - Side (When I step side, it opens her up to face me) GUAPERIA: 1 - Open Break (I step back, she steps back) 2 3 Open right palm to her 4 - Pull her toward me (Left hand toward center of chest, right hand forward and to the right) 5 - Bounce her back 6 ---To Exit: 3 - Step side to wind her up 4 - Cross back 5 - Spot+ 6 - Turn

123 456 - Basic 1 - Step BACK left (she still does a back break) 2 - Onto right 3 - Slow on left (123 = reverse basic) Get her left with my right (my thumb in her palm) 4 - FORWARD right (between her legs) (Lead her forward) 5 - Onto left (push her back) 6 - Slow on right (456 = reverse basic) 123 - To open her up, rotate arm down To Exit: 4 - Slight forward and stay turned away 5 - Lead her arm down the slot (to get her to step forward) 6 - Cross right foot in front of left (for wind up) 123 - Double left turn (she doubles right) 456 - Cumbia or back basic

123 - Both do a back-break (Wind her up on 3 and point right hand to left) (During turn have one finger pointing down) 45 - Turn her 1 1/2 turns to her left 6 - Lower right hand as she completes last turn

Beginning same as regular sugar-push.
1 - Lead her back (Left back) 2 - Lead her top stop (Step right) (Arms down, without spreading them out) 3 - Tap (left) (push her straight back) 4 - Step Forward (left)
& - Step Right 5 - Tap Forward (left) 6 - Step Left Continue... To Exit: & - Same (Step right) 7 - Tap Toe forward Left & - Step forward right 1 - Step back Left
Her footwork: 1 - Step forward right 2 - Step Left 3 - ? Tap right 4 - Straight Back right (since I am pushing you back) Pattern: & - Step Left 5 - Tap back right 6 - Step back right Exit: & - Step left 1 - Forward right
With Texas push exit: & - Step rignt (Lead her back with heals of hands) 6 - Tap HEAL forward left & - Step Left 6 - Tap Toe back right
& - Step forward Left 1 - Back left

Same start as sugar push:
1 - Step Back (Left) 2 - Step Together (right) 3 - Tap Left 4 - Step Left & - Tap Toe Right and Push her out 5 - Step Right & - Tap Heal Left 6 - Step Left continue with &5&6 To Exit: & - Step together (forward) right 1 - Step back left (usually leading a tuck to the right)

From an outside turn: 3&4 - Switch hands my right to her right.
Here it is: 1 - Lead her (my) backward and to my left (so she checks forward) & - Lead her forward and to the right (so she turns away) 2 - She steps forward left (SMALL STEP) (Rest of her steps are outside turn footwork) 3 - She Turns toward me right & - Forward left 4 - She steps side right
Back to basic

From r-r 1 - Step (l) toward right of lady and pivot left 2 - Step back left 3 - Hook right back and rotate further around lady (She does her right basic)
4 - Bring hand down and slightly forward to pivot lady (elvis right) 5 - sweep hand up (cross left) 6 - and onto my shoulder (side right) (She does back pivot) --------------Now you do a standard rotator: 1 - Forward left and pivot left 2 - Back 3 - Hook back left and rotate 4 - Elvis right 5 - Cross left 6 - Side ------------Into open open position left to right or--------Into guaperia Reverse basic for me I lead by sweeping left hand from 12 to 2 o'clock 123 Lead the second part with my right hand holding her left wrist 4 - Step forward and lead her forward 5 - She steps back 6 - slow ------------Into kick slide ?? ------------Exit with double turn 1 - Press side left 2 - Step right 3 - Cross left in front of right You are wound up 4 - Cross right in front of left 56 Double turn left

Left to Right
123 - Same steps, keep your left low to wind her up 456 - Make a large circle to pivot her left, on 6, lead your hand in front of her to pivot her to face the same direction as you... on your left side
123 - Steps: side (l), cross (r), side (l): Lead her across your back (over your head) and place her right hand into your left hand (she steps in place or moves to her right)
Options: 456 - Free spin her out
456 - Wrap her 123 - Rock and Roll to my left 456 - Spin her out?

DanceStep.Description: Rotator to Back to Face Cucaracha
DanceStep.Comment:
Start r-r 123 - Same as rotating cross body
NOTE different steps (basicly left jazz box) 4 - Forward (r) 5 - Side (l) 6 - Cross (r)
Lead her to pivot behind me, place her right hand onto my right shoulder
123 - Cucharacha left (she cucarachas right) 456 - Cucharacha right (she cucarachas left)
12 - Cucharacha left (she cucarachas right) 3 - Cross in front (l) and wind up 4 - Step across (r) and unwind 56 - Finish 1 1/2 to left
123 - Forward basic

Left over right 123 - Same rotator steps 456 - Pivot her to left 123 - Pivot her across my back Lower my right and and continue turning her into hammerlock ??? Is this right ??? 456 - Into hammerlock 123 - Forward cross body 456 - Finish cross body out

123 - Start rotator 456 - Both hand over her head, into my left in pizza waiter, right resting on my bicept
123 - Pivot her across my back and switch arm position (left pizza waiter, right on left bicept)
456 - Now split hands and continue her turning into cuddle
123 456 - Unwrap her into sexy cucharacha

1 - Rock her back (I rock left) & - Left her rock forward (but do not lead her in) (I step right) 2 - I Turn Away and STEP on my right foot 3 - I Step forward left (SMALL STEP) & - I Povit back 4 - I Step Side
1-4 Basic 1-8 Natural Top 1-4 Rock her out 5-8 Outside turn 1-4 I Turn away 1-4 Switch hands and Forward outside roll (step her up for the next move by not letting her finish the move) 1-4 Free spin

Natural top footwork: 1 - Lead her back slightly 2 - Wind her up 3 - Open her up and flick her wrist so she continues to (spot turn) 456 - Curving cumbia catch left to left thumbs down. --------Change of place exit You know this --------Other exit Left to left and wave right to right 123 - Lead change of place but both hands over 456 - I step through to my left and spot turn, keeping both hands 123 - Same (two hands over) 456 - Hook turn to exit

DanceStep.Description: Natural Top with Inside Turn Exit
DanceStep.Comment: Natural Top 456 - Hook, Side, Cross in front 1 - Open her up 2 - Lead an inside (her left) turn 3 - Roll and lock 4 - Second half of Natural Top

Do 2 Flippys 1 - Back Left (same) & - Slight forward right and in front of her 2 - Step and pivot on left to her other side (She was doing basic in place)
3 - Back right & - Start curving her in 4 - She pivots in front of me
To Exit: 1 - Lead inside turn (fingers point to my left)

Start same as locked whip: 1234 - Same 5 - Draw her to my right hip and step in front of her 6 - Spin and transfer her to my left hip (step on left foot to stop) 7 - Step back slightly right and check her forward & - Step around left 8 - Step right as you send her down the slot 9 - Step left 10 - Step right

DanceStep.Description: Double Inside turn + Roll and Lock (42:37)
DanceStep.Comment: From Closed: 123 Start of Cross Body (Keep left hand low) (really wind her up) 456 Raise left hand as she pivots three times then ROLL AND LOCK Lower Hand. Use rotatator to exit: 123 Rotator footwork (I pivot 180 deg left) 456 Rotator to open (left to right)

Start same as locked whip: 1234 - Same 5 - Draw her forward 6 - Let go of my left hand, press right forarm into her back and start spinning her, drop hand and twist to get her to hammerlock 7 - She spins left 8 - When she stops, she is facing me right hand on her her hand on her hip. Connect left to right in front of my face 1 - Lead her forward and lead right across my face to turn her 180 deg. 2 3 4 - I step under my arm (start turn left) 5 - Spin 360 deg to left 6 - Catch right to right and lead her out on 1

r-l 123 Curving progressive cumbia 456 Lead inside turn On 6 do pizza waiter with right over my head, and stop her left arm with my left hand 123 (run, run, run) Lead her to turn left (start roll and lock on 2 or 3) 456 2nd Half of Natural Top ---------variation: two hands over-------- 123 Same with two hands over 456 In to pizza waiter (right hand up, left on shoulder)

From Left to Right, Natural top footwork: 1 - Lead her back slightly 2 - Wind her up 3 - Open her up and flick her wrist so she continues to (spot turn right) 456 - Curving cumbia catch left to left thumbs down. ------------ Reverse flip exit Lead her into a reverse flip (on 2 she pivots back left) Typical exit (Also natural top footwork) 123 - I do open break curving (right). She does curving cumbia (lead her sideways on 4) 456 - Roll and lock to a natural top --------Change of place exit You know this --------Other exit Left to left and wave right to right 123 - Lead change of place but both hands over 456 - I step through to my left and spot turn, keeping both hands 123 - Same (two hands over) 456 - Hook turn to exit

From open position, left to right, hooked hand position 123 - Level 2 Turning Cumbia to Closed (I lead her to 1 - Step back slightly, 2 - Step forward and wind her up to my left, 3 open her up so she faces me), left hand pressures her right hand in. 456 - Hook, Side, Hook (Be sure to Make a 7 on hook and rotate on side) (Be sure to pull her with my lead (left) hand) 123 - Side, Hook, Side 456 - Hook, Side (don't rotate as much to open her up), Cross in front. ------------Hip Twist exit---------- 1 - Rotate and press into my left foot (lead down toward her hip with my left) (She should be in mirror position as she steps back right) 2 - Create a wall and lead her to swivel in front of me on her left foot (about her shoulder level) 3 - Maintain the wall and lead ler to swivel back (to face toward my left) 456 - End of cross body lead

DanceStep.Description: RIght to right crossbody to man's faceloop (43:44)
DanceStep.Comment: Right to Right 123 = Rotating crossbody (3 = stop to wind her up) & = breath arm up slightly 4 = Crank garden hose 5, 6 = Her right arm over my shoulder 1-6 = Rotating crossbody

DanceStep.Description: Right to Right Crossbody to Shadow (44:25)
DanceStep.Comment: Similar to r-r rotator. R-R 123 - Wind her up 45 6 - Turn her hand backwards and on her right shoulder and stop her in shadow. 1 - She steps forward She back pivots right (Halo her with my right hand) 2 - Pivot 3 - Pivot 4 - Pivot 5 - Pivot 6 - Side

Hold Hands, I do natural top (start with level 2 cumbia) 123 - On 3 Lower right hand, lead her into a spot turn with left hand. 456 - She does spot turn, I hook, side into hammerlock (I headloop myself on 6 with right hand) My left hand is now on her hip on top of her (hammerlocked) right hand. 1 - Lead her back using her hip 2 - She steps forward 3 - She pivots so we are hand to hand again. 4 - Pull her to my left with my left hand 5 6 - Head loop myself with my left hand. 123 - Cross body lead 456 - Finish cross body lead
-----------Pivot Variation---------- Lead is the same a the turnstyle: 123 - Same, except lead her FORWARD with my right hand 456 - Same, except she will pivot around me.
Same as open break, but break a second time forward You must do it on the other side to get the count straight again.

DanceStep.Description: Ladies inside roll to man headloop, kick step across, one ha
DanceStep.Comment:
Ladies inside roll to man headloop, kick step across, one hand tuck out
Switch hands to right to right hand hold. 12 Lead her to walk forward 34 She turns and I lead her into a man's headloop. 56 Lead her back and then forward across the slot. 1 Lead her back and then side slightly so she will: 23456 ... Tuck
On 1 start twisting my frame to the right. 2 Break forward right of lady 3 4 & 5 - Start twisting my frame to left 6 - Break forward left 7

123 - Start of cross body lead 456 - Turn her left on 5 (opposite turn as cross body lead) Now you are right over left 123 - Cross body again to pizza waiter 4 - Step across with right (twist) (Draw lead her with your right and headloop left) 56 Unwind and face her ---------------- Other 123 - Start of cross body lead 456 - Turn her left on 5 (opposite turn as cross body lead) Now you are right over left 1 - Pull with left 23 - To back to back Lead down with left to free spin her. -----------------Other 123 Face loop her with my right hand over her right shoulder (her hand goes over her left shoulder) 4 Lead her back with my hand on her shoulder 56 - Cross body lead (LEAVE hand on her shoulder and stop her) 1 Lead her forward 23456 - Lead her backwards to pivot and free spin -----------------Other 123 Natural top 456 To hammerlock 123 - I do a jazz box around her back (switching hands) 456 - Inside double turn her (on 4 lead her with my low hammerlocked hand) and keep the other above her head. -----------------Other 123456 - Sombrero 123456 - Reverse Sombrero 123456 - Faceloop to crossbody lead

Note: all movement is side-to-side. 1&2 - Left basic Raise left hand and place flat to lead her in a turn 3&4 - Right basic - Don't move far to right as she is moving away 56 Step back 1&2 - Left basic Raise left hand to turn her back to face me 3&4 - Right basic 56 Rock back

56 Pull left hand toward my shoulder and palm toward her. 1&2 - Bring her forward into cuddle (I do forward, forward, forward (small)) 3&4 - Back, Back, Back (she mirrors my steps) 56 - We both rock back 1&2 - Forward, forward, forward Raise hand again to turn her back around 3&4 - Back, Back, Back 56 Rock Back
-------------Nice Exit (same as 2nd half of underarm turn) (since my left hand is reversed) 1&2 - Lead her to turn left AND turn the partnership 90 deg to right. 3&4 Right basic

1 - Back right 2 - Side (Left) left & - Step right 3 - Forward (and to the left) left 4 - Forward right 5 - Hold (But lead her forward into crusada) 6 - Forward (outside her foot) left 7 - Side (right) right 8 - Together left

1 - Back right 2 - Side (left) left 3 - Forward (angled) right 4 - Side left 5 - Ocho 1 (Together right dont step on right, just bring to left) 6 - Ocho 2 7 - Ocho 3 8 - Ocho 4 9 - Change her direction (so she can go backwards on the next count) (and feet together) 10 - Forward LEFT 11 - Forward right 12 - Forward (left) 13 - Feet together (crusida) 14 - Forward left 15 - Side right 16 - Together left

123 - Forward left, brush side right, together left 456 - Back left, brush back left, together right
1 - Heal first, step straight forward 2 - Side right and up onto toe and turn 45 deg to left 3 - Together onto both feet and lower smoothly
NOTE: Remember to Pass foot through and land on heal first
123 - Same 456 - Forward left, brush side right, together left
123 - Same 4 - Release right hand 5 - Raise left hand 6 Continue basic, turn left on 3 1 - Forward left 2 - Brush side right 3 - Together

(&) Remember to lead her a half beat before the open
2 - Open her and step BACK left 3 - Step forward and face each other right 4 - Step side left & - Step side right 5 - Together left 6 - Open her and step FORWARD right 7 - Close and face her (left) 8 - Open her and step Foward right & - Lock step left 1 - Forward right 2 - Break forward left
---------Reverse it on the way out (backwards)
3 - Replace right 4 - Back left & - Lock step right 5 - Back left 6 - Turn her to face me again 7 - Open her and step back 8 - Turn her to face me & - Side 1 - Together
------------- Easy exit: 2 - Open break (forward left)
------------- Figure 4 exit: 2 - Open break left 3 - Lead back and kick left leg straight so right foot is on my left knee 4 - Side & - Together 5 - Side 6 - break forward LEFT repeat a even number of times since you don't change feet on this pattern ------------- Flick exit 2 - Turn her and step back (left) 3 - Step back (right) 4 - Twist (left) & - Twist (right) 5 - Flick right (weight on left) 6 - Forward right (Going back the original direction) 7 - Side (left) 8 - Together (right) & - Side (left) 1 - Together (right) ----------Alternate ending: Circle thing 2 - Step back 3 - Step together Keep walking backwards while pumping

Chasse left: left together right, left Rotate her around, lower on the left (she kicks left between my legs)
Chasse right: right together left, right Rotate her around, lower on the right (she kicks)
Turn her around left Forward right Forward left Crusida + together right
Forward (curving) left side right Together

Triple left Right hand over her right hand triple and I turn right Place my left hand in her right hand Rock back --- Now lead an underarm turn
or--------- Same steps: Triple right Send right hand forward, set left hand on my hip (she circles my belt) triple left turning right catch RIGHT to right Rock step
---Alternate ending: tripe left turning and headloop right hand over my head and left her right hand slide down my left arm to my hand

Her footwork is cross-body lead. 1 - Forward 2 - Back 3 - Back Flip and raise left hand and continue her moving forward 4 - Hook right behind (she pivots) 5 - Side left (She goes back) 6 - Forward right (She goes back)
----Variation: 6 - Same, I go into Pizza Waiter 1 - I spot turn to right 2 3 - Step side left and lead her into a spot turn 4 - She 5 - Spot 6 - Turns
----Variation 6 - Same, I go into Pizza Waiter 1 - I reach turn to left 2 - Faceloop myself 3 - and place her hand on my right shoulder 4 - Reach 5 - Turn 6 - Back

DanceStep.Description: Traveling, Basic Box, and Trouble Step
DanceStep.Comment:
Traveling = 1 - Forward (l) 2 - Forward (r) & - Side (l) 3 - Together (r)
Box= 1 - Forward (l) & - Side (r) 2 - Together (l) + optional: 3 - Back (r) & - Side (l) 4 - Together (r)
Trouble step= 1 - Forward (l) 2 - BACK (r) now rotate 45 deg to my left & - Side (l) 3 - Together (r)

DanceStep.Description: Rotator + roll and Lock and + l-l
DanceStep.Comment:
Rotator + Coca Cola + Roll and Lock: 123 - Rotator (on 3 place my left hand on her left shoulder) (Pivot, step hook) 4 - Lead her to pivot and rotate (3 times) (Elvis) 5 - Roll (Cross) 6 - and Lock (side) + another rotator 1 - STEP FORWARD left and pivot 23456 - Finish rotator
----------------------------
Rotator - l-l
123 Rotator 456 Lead her to pivot (Lead is Low, High(around her head), low) 123 - Jaz Box to Left (flip hand over my head) 456 - Free spin her and Roll and Lock 1 - STEP FORWARD 23456 - Finish rotator

---------Pattern 1 - Side by Side from end to end--------- Open break, switch r-r, break, lead her into side-by-side. 23 - Break back and lead her toward me 41 - NOTE: I do not synchopate so my feet match hers. Lead her into side-by-side 23 - Back break 4&1 - Forward - Side - Back (to the other side of the slot in side-by-side) (REPEAT) Exit by sending her straight out (and not turning her NOTE: Do NOT synchopate on send out to reverse feet) ---Variation: Spin her while going across: Wind up slightly and lead her with leading hand to turnaway from me. Place leading hand on wrist to spin. ---------Pattern 3 - El Uno ---- After break do El-Uno Then Two-Hand El Uno, Then Double head-loop Followed by a cross-body lead ---------Pattern 4 - Side by side + cross body lead ---- After break: Lead her across THEN Lead her forward into doing cross-body footwork to other side of slot (optional spin)
On rock step: 1 - Back 2 - Bring her forward with my hand flat in front of her inside my shoulder her head height 3&4 Now press back and tilt hand down 5&6 - She spins left

12 - Regular Rock-Step 3&4 - Raise both hands, press right hand slightly forward to turn partnership Both hands over our heads 5&6 - Slide r-r down to fingertips
Follow with inside turn

Closed basic: 12 - Rock Leave partnership open by leading open with my RIGHT hand on her shoulder 3 - Kick left 4 - Kick right Close partnership by bringing my LEFT hand to my side 5 - Kick to my forward left (to her right side) (She kicks between my legs) 6 - Kick with my right between her legs 12 - Rock back

DanceStep.Description: Pattern where she rotates around me
DanceStep.Comment: 1 - Back right 2 - Side left 3 - Forward right (Now keep my feet the same and rotate/pivot to the left) 4 - She steps forward 5 - She steps forward 6 - She steps side 7 - She steps back stopping on my right left 8 - Turn her to kick between my legs 9 - Pick her up 10 - Ocho left 11 - Turn her back 12 - Forward left 13 - Side right 14 - Together left
Do change step and then change to right box (turning right)

DanceStep.Description: Rotator to Face to Back Cucharacha
DanceStep.Comment: 123 Start rotating cross body BUT close on 4 Lead her to pivot 4 - Step forward 5 - Lift left leg and turn it to right as you lead her hand to: (lead my hand over MY head) 6 - my right shoulder ---- Cucharacha Left Cucharacha Right ------ Exit 1 Cucharacha Left 4 - Step right 56 - Spin left (to almost face her) 123456 - Side cucharacha -------Exit 2 On 6 step forward then do a reach turn and a hook turn with a full turn. 123 - Reach turn (Keep your distance) (You are facing her) 456 - Hook turn (full) to face her again

DanceStep.Description: Rotator to back to face cucaracha (two hands)
DanceStep.Comment: Similar to other move. Hold two hands: 123 - Lead with left 4 - Right hand high 5 - Italian salute to pizza waiter (left hand up, right hand on bicept) 6 - Drop left hand over my right shoulder and lower her hands and place on my rib cage. --- Cucaracha left Cucaracha right (switch hand so they are not crossed) --- Exit 1 - Step forward slightly right 2 - Step back diagional left (large) 3 - lead down so she does a left pivot out 456 - She pivots in front of me.

12 - Rock 3&4 - Sha Say Side Open up the partnership with my right hand 5&6 - Triple step forward 1 - Close left 2 - Turn forward right 3 - Close left 4 - Turn forward right
5&6 - Triple step right

1 - Back left 2 - Side right & - Step left 3 - Forward right 4 - Forward left 5 - Crusida 6 - I Step back left (Turn her to my left and do ocho) 7 - I Curve back right (ocho) 8 - Stand in place (ocho) 9 - Stand in place and close feet (ocho) Turn her and make her walk backwards to do: 12- 14 Tango close

1 - Back left 2 - Side right 3 - Forward left 4 - Forward right Turn her to my right and have her step back (left?) 6 - Press my right shoe to hers 7 - Sandwich my left foot 8 - Step forward left and around her 9 - Push her foot around with my right foot 10 - Sandwich left 11 - Rub her foot left 12 - Step back right 13 - She steps forward left 14 - She rubs my leg with her right 15 - She steps past me with (left?) 16,17,18 - Tango close

1 - Back left 2 - Side right 3 - Step left 4 - forward right 5 - Turn her to my right and have her step back 6 - Push my right foot into hers 7 - turn her to my right 8 - have her step through 9 - Rotate her slightly so she kicks between my legs 10 - Turn her and lead her back across 11+ - Tango close
Open with my right hand (keep my left hand between us... don't push out) Look down line of dance. Forward Left, Forward Right, Close right hand. Side left, Together right

Same footwork as promenade: Open with my right hand (keep my left hand between us... don't push out) Look down line of dance. Forward Left, Forward Right (Drop right hand), Side left (and Lead turn with left hand), Together right
NOTE: Her footwork: Forward right, Forward left, Forward right (quick), Turn on left(quick)
-----------Inside turn variation: Lead inside (her left) turn on second slow.

Typically start 45 deg to right of line of dance. Forward left, Forward right -turn 45 deg right (so side step takes me down line of dance) Side left, Together right -Turn 45 deg right. Back left, back right. - Turn 45 deg left. Side left, together right - turn 45 deg right (repeat)

RIGHT to RIGHT handhold 12 - Rock-Step 3&4 - Pivot right, Walk, Walk (forward) and touch her back. 5&6 - Pivot left, Walk, Walk (forward) and she touches my back (continue)
---Exit (from her touching my back) Raise hand and do inside turn. 7&8 - Raise hand over her head and turn her to face me 9&10 - Triple left 11,12 - Rock Step
12 - Rock her back with my left hand and bring her in to my stomach 3&4 - Triple Forward and rotate 56 - Hook, Step Side (while rotating) 7&8 - Triple right 12 - Rock Step

12 Rock Back raise my left hand and lead her forward 3&4 - She triples toward me Place my right hand on her back to stop her 56 - Rock 7&8 - Triple back 9&10 - Rock
---- Exit 3&4 - Triple Keep her turning to face me 5&6 - Triple right 12 Rock step

Generic Whip Footwork. 1 - Lead her forward, and raise her hand 2 - Put my right hand on her back (roll and lock) 3 & 4 - Lead her forward in closed 5-8 Finish whip -------- Different on second half 1-4 Generic whip 5 - back 6 - Side (left) 7&8 - Sailor shuffle (left) -------- Walk 1-4 Same as first one 5 - Turn down the slot (she is turned backwards) 6 - Walk straight down the slot. 7&8 - Turn 45 deg left (keep her in closed) 1 - Lead her BACK 2 - lead her forward 3&4 - Lead her in a circle in front of me. 5 - STOP her and send her back 6 - She walks back 7&8 - Release my right hand and let her go back

Normal break. 4 - Side left & - Together right 1 - Start open left 2 - Check forward right (Ball, heal) 3 - Back 4 - Turn Side -----Double break (Must be in pairs of two -----Double reach turn 2 - Forward right 3 - Reach turn (push her elbow on the turn) -----Pivot? 2 - Forward right (make sure she gets fully onto her left foot) 3 - Pivot to face her and TAP left 4 & 1 - Shahsay -----Pattern 2 - Forward right (same as last) 3 - Pivot back the other way (flip right hand to face out to pull her forward on the next move) 4 - Forward right & - Forward left 1 - Pivot right (leading with right hand) 2 - Break back

Start open r-l (Natural Top Footwork):
123 - Level two basic to start natural top: 4 - Hook 5 - 6 - Place her behind you and flip her hand over you head and into your left hand Now both facing the same way.
1 - Move forward and make her step BACK 2 - Bring her forward 3 - and send her right hand up, turn 90 deg to my left and take her left hand
456 - Lead a inside turn for her (Pivot, Pivot, Pivot) to a man's headloop.
Now do a coca-cola, except instead on me turning x on y, I do a reach turn back to her on 5.

Continuious Whip (repeat 5/6)
Free spin ladies whip
Whip man's spin
Tandum spin (signal 5/6, man's turn 7/8)
Double underarm turn to Hammerlock Lead her behind me and turn left under MY arm

1 Cumbia left 2345 - Lead her to pivot to her left (eliptical over her head) (stay in front on her) 6 - Stop her 123 - I cucaracha left (she does turning cucharacha right) 456 - Opposite cucharacha 123 - Cucharacha left 456 - Lead her to sit (Hands should be right over ?left) 1 - Pull her in with my left 23 - and push it out to open her to my right (have I lost count) (Now do the turkish towel) 456 - Pivot? her behind my back 123 - Lead down to pivot her in front of me Exit?

R-R 123 - Forward, Back, Back 4 - Lead her to turn (she is done cross-body footwork) 56 - Right hand close to my right hip 1 - Break forward and make her break back 2 - Lead her forward to the center of my back then through my right arm 3456 - She does turnstyle footwork -----or------ Left over Right 123 - Forward, Back, Back -two options: 1: 4 - Split hands, left hand low and I spot turn to right 56 - into my hammerlock 123 - Her faceloop 456 - x-body out -option 2: 4 Hook 5 - turn 6 around 123 - Her faceloop 456 - x-body out -----or------- Hold hands 123 - Change of place 4 -left hand 56 - pulls her in (right hand over her head, then down to her hip 123 - I break forward, she breaks back then progresses forward 456 - I cumbia right, she reach turns (my hand is on her shoulder) 123456 - Same as last, except into pizza waiter 123 - Roman towel (I jazz box left) 456 - Let go left and make her pivot left to the front of me

Basic in open position holding hands. 456 Lead her in an underarm turn (or double) place her hand in hammerlock. Right hand on her right hip. 1 - Have her step back 2 - She steps forward. 3 - She steps forward, I turn toward her. 456 - I do a reach turn to right. (switch hands - l-l) 123 - Have her do a back basic and I turn side. 456 - Free spin her to her right.

Hold hands - open basic 123 - Her back Forward Forward 456 - Turn her on 4 (left... x-body footwork) 123 - Reach turn right - put her hand on my shoulder 4 lead her FORWARD 56 - Turn back to her to closed. ----------- or 123 Full reach turn to 456 lead her into a spot turn to closed ---------------- 123 Rotator 456 Eleptical lead so she does 1.5 pivot to pizza waiter. ----- two exits ------------- 1: Raise her hand over my head 23 456 rotator out. -- 2: 123 Or lower hand 456 To free spin her out

2 hand tuck with a wrap. -----------Unwrap------- 12 Walk her forward 3 DROP left hand on unwind 4 stop her w/my right hand on her right elbow. 5 Pull back w/right and free spin 6 her out (to her left)
Left side pass with these changes: 12 Her steps forward forward 3 raise hand to have her turn to her 456 right.

Basic: Forward Left (step flat) forward right (ball of foot only) Shift weight (using flex in left leg). continue. Side basic. Side basic with feet in 5 position. Forward: Left forward, place right toe behind, pull left foot back slightly. Exit is: right forward (turn toe right). Side left, together right. Basic turning box: Left forward (turning toe left). right ball on floor. pull left in. Right foot back and flat. left toe side (keep heel up). Slide right in. Big box: Forward left, right toe forward, slide left together. right toe side (and repeat)... right foot back. left toe forward (work your way left now)

Basic, open position, start coca-cola my left hand on her right shoulder. 123 Start of x-body lead. 456 Rest of x-body, stop her on facing away from me (by holding her right shoulder with my right hand). 123 - Me - Forward, side turn back toward her. Her - Back, Forward, turn. 456 - I do a ??? FOrgot

El Siete. X-Body Lead from open position similar to positioning for open break except don't have her step forward on 6. 123 - Of x-body 45 6 - Step side to open her up. Hold her hand from the top. 1 - Lead her hand down and toward the floor and in front of me. I step back diagonally behind her. 23 456 - Level 2 basic toward her (She does 23 pivot, pivot. 45 Pivot, pivot, 6 side.) To basic: Or... I can do the following on 4-6. 23 - Pivot, Pivot. 456 - Read turn forward. --- Cool ending: 123456 - Rotating cross body lead.

Same start as last week: Cross body to opening position (same as cha-cha break, but step side instead of forward on 6 and tap left on 8) ===== 123 Lead her left hand down to wrap her into my side (My right hand on her left shoulder) (same steps... lrl, tap left... lead her onto my hip). 4 upwrap her gently by leading with my hip.
